name: dotenv-sanitize
description: Sanitize your dotenv files to easily create examples, or cleanup before a commit.

editor.dotenvSecretReplacement.description: Either an arbitrary string, or the specific cipher to be used for obfuscation of secrets with in your dotenv file.

editor.dotenvSecretReplacementRedactions.description: An array of keys to be redacted from the results of the newly sanitized dotenv file.

editor.dotenvSecretReplacementExemptions.description: An array of keys to be left unaltered within your dotenv file by the sanitization process.
